com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider.continuations

Class AuthenticationContinuation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider.continuations.AuthenticationContinuation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CognitoIdentityProviderContinuation<java.lang.String>

    public class AuthenticationContinuation
extends java.lang.Object
implements CognitoIdentityProviderContinuation<java.lang.String>
    Defines Continuation for authentication. This Continuation is used when user log-in details are required to continue to authenticate the user and get tokens.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean RUN_IN_BACKGROUND
      Run in background.
      static boolean RUN_IN_CURRENT
      Run on current thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void continueTask()
      Continues the authentications process by responding to the "PASSWORD_VERIFIER" challenge with username and password.
      java.lang.String getParameters()
      Returns the parameters required for this continuation.
      void setAuthenticationDetails(AuthenticationDetails authenticationDetails)
      Set details required to continue with this authentication.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthenticationContinuation

        public AuthenticationContinuation(CognitoUser user,
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  boolean runInBackground,
                                  AuthenticationHandler callback)
        Constructs a new continuation in the authentication process.
        Parameters:
        user - REQUIRED: Reference to the CognitoUser object.
        context - REQUIRED: Application context to manage threads.
        runInBackground - REQUIRED: Represents where this continuation has to run.
        callback - REQUIRED: Callback to interact with the app.

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        public java.lang.String getParameters()
        Returns the parameters required for this continuation.
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface CognitoIdentityProviderContinuation<java.lang.String>
        Returns:

      • continueTask

        public void continueTask()
        Continues the authentications process by responding to the "PASSWORD_VERIFIER" challenge with username and password. Depending upon the initial call, the response call is name in the current or the background thread.
        Specified by:
        continueTask in interface CognitoIdentityProviderContinuation<java.lang.String>

        Set details required to continue with this authentication.
